thread.title: Fodor's Week in Travel: Urban Escapes
thread.title_full: Fodor's Week in Travel: Urban Escapes

title: Fodor's Week in Travel: Urban Escapes
text:
Fodor's Week in Travel: Urban Escapes Fodor's Week in Travel: Urban Escapes Posted by Sara Quaranta on July 17, 2015 at 4:00:00 PM EDT | Post a Comment 
There's nothing like bright lights and a beautiful skyline, and this week we've got tons of city-centered activities for you to enjoy, from the Big Apple to Phuket. Whether you want to sip some tea while cuddling with a kitten or check out all of the free fun in Washington, D.C., our weekly roundup has your next trip covered. Where to Eat in NYC: Summer 2015 
These new hot spots in Brooklyn and Manhattan, with everything from from tavern cuisine to Sicilian coastal fare to creative Greek classics, will make your mouth water. 10 Irresistibly Cute Cat Cafes Around the World 
Looking for a fuzzy friend to cuddle up with at a cozy cafe? We've got ten spots worldwide where you can do just that. Q&A: Thai Hotelier Vorasit “Wan” Issara 
We sat down with the managing director of the multi-award-winning Sri panwa in Thailand and talked about what makes a great hotel and why Phuket is such an in-demand destination. Top 25 Free Things to Do in Washington, D.C. 
With some of the best museums and sights in the country, there are plenty of free-of-charge activities in the nation's capital. 
Top to Bottom: Ayla Christman; Cat Man Of West Oakland; Courtesy of Sri panwa; Mary A. Behre
